translation: Abv lhb sndụ̄ donvae aathh phuttin byyhi gczihn suh tbah (tmụ̄ chhe sạnis ttạtthis pytth aathh tulnch kvshsh krmcz).
Ts vatnvv nh tmụ̄ sndụ̄ (vrathtkụ̄) maln kanhh fạydh th nah tmụ̄ snzikmayhi.
ʿnqryb gczihh suh tath nars mnz yath lmbkh āsn vothan.
Th tmụ̄snz (khbyth) znan (thi) yosh (knddụ̄ dar) zinụ̄bvr (kls pytth) tulith phyran chhe, (th sanis ttạtthiụ̄ sndụ̄ tlh ptụ̄ zkhmy krnh khạṭr chhe rạcz mnz tihnzn vatn vathravan).
Tmụ̄ snzi grdnhi mnz āshi khzr dyln hnz (soe) raz (yymhi sintụ̄ knddyn hnz giydd chhe gnddan).
